About
ECB is source code browser for Emacs. It is a global minor-mode which displays a couple of windows that can be used to browse directories, files and methods. It supports method parsing for Java, C, C++, Elisp etc.

News
ECB 1.80 released! (2002-08-12)
Here is a short installation guide. Click here for information about changes in the new version.

ECB 1.70 released! (2002-03-01)

ECB 1.60 released! (2002-01-20)
Many improvements. Works fine with Emacs 21.

ECB 1.52 released! (2001-10-24)
Fixed a small bug when loading ECB.

ECB 1.51 released! (2001-10-21)
Some new features.

ECB 1.50 released! (2001-08-12)
A couple of minor improvements and some bug fixes.


Dependencies
Semantic BovinatorVersion 1.4 or higher.
EIEIOVersion 0.17 or higher.
JDEEIf you use ECB for Java development.

If you use XEmacs you must have the fsf-compat package installed (contains overlay.el).

Feedback
Please use the public ECB mailing list for reporting bugs, making suggestions and asking questions about ECB.
